1526546167_1NZftAz9VSawGF5JgMYGFv4ByoKEa.body:
> [deafboy](#comment_56_1xf9XC4Nsa7YfQWFiK6xGsNDJA3AaCTUa): By all means play the video games if it makes you happy. As long as you can enjoy something, anything, it's good. It's when you suddenly stop being able to enjoy things you used to like you know you have a problem.

exactly. older people telling us to  "get off your phone and enjoy" .. i hate that. let us enjoy what this generation has, as they enjoyed their things too. i bet their parents told them to "turn off that walkman for once" too...just enjoy what you got.
